Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
Generates a SOAP request to delete documents from TAMINO
(Info: Uses a copy of BXA029 to build this program)
30.05.2012 JH SCR17359 Added parameter PI.DELETEREPA and task Update Repa
-- path for temp. data, output, templates, ...
-- pathname of om templates ...
-- temporary file
-- sequence number for temp. filename
-- needed for errorhandling
-- Blobs for HTTPPOST
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Directory for templates
-- Directory for temporary files
Check if template file header exists ....
Check if template file footer exists ....
Check if template file detail exists ....
Check for existing TempDirectory
read URL for SOAP request from .ini ....
Create XML request detail/header/footer file ...
No reports have to be deleted from Tamino
Build final XML request file
read xml into blob and post to Tamino SOAP adapter ....
since we have it stored in a blob we do not need the XML file anymore
parse response XML file ....
delete temp. xml file ...

ExpSyntax.val: 'Temporary working path for XML files'&' '&Trim ({0,4})&' '&'does not exists'
'.ini entries for SOAP adapter ([DOCSERVER]SOAP_ADAPTER_HOST and/or [DOCSERVER]SOAP_ADAPTER_URL missing)'
'No reports exists in table Report-Archive, which have to be deleted'

Text.val: Check for <report> element ....
... get total numbers of handeld journal numbers by Tamino, uses to exit program
... get journal numbers handled by Tamino
... check if report was successfully deleted by Tamino
... if report was deleted from Tamino, delete related REPA row

ExpSyntax.val: 'Journal number = '&' '&Trim (Str ({0,1},'10'))&' '&' was not deleted from Tamino, updated REPA_DELETEFROMTAMINO with N'
'Journal number = '&' '&Trim (Str ({0,1},'10'))&' '&' was not deleted from Tamino, deletion of Report_Archive will be skipped'
'Invalid response from Tamino, if deletion was succesfully performed'
